channel.title: Model Editing Please Help
channel.description:
Ok I need help with models in my client. I have tons of models I just need the right programs the only one that i currently have is RSMV. Can give me some help on finding the programs to edit the models and put them in my server and client.
-Thanks for any help anyone gives.
-ZerkerPure ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 06:16:36 am[/size][hr]come on even posted in the right section......[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 06:59:17 am[/size][hr]i just want to know how to change the colors and edit the items
